session.objective: Implement Phase 1 of GitHub Actions local testing epic: Add actionlint validation to pre-commit hook, Validate-PrePR.ps1, and Worktrunk config. Update SHIFT-LEFT.md documentation.

nextSteps: Monitor workflow YAML error rates in CI to validate 80%+ reduction target
Gather developer feedback on actionlint, act, and yamllint usability
Consider adding act-specific workflow examples or test scenarios
Track PR iteration counts and CI minutes to measure projected impact
workLog: Explored repository structure and existing validation infrastructure
